titleStmt.title: New practical observations in surgery containing divers remarkable cases and cures. By Hugh Ryder surgeon in ordinary to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Ryder, Hugh.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Partridge, stationer to his Royal Highness Prince George of Denmark at the Post-house between Charing-Cross, and Whtie-hall [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Royal College of Surgeons of England Library, London.

person.persName: James Partridge, stationer to his Royal Highness Prince George of Denmark
